item.title: Famitsu Sales: 11/11/24 – 11/17/24
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/famitsu-sales-11-11-24-11-17-24

  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

Dragon Quest III HD-2D Remake debuts at 821,770 retail sales.

Famitsu has published its estimated physical game software data for Japan for the week of November 11, 2024 to November 17, 2024.

Dragon Quest III HD-2D Remake was the highest-selling new release of the week, opening at 641,195 units on Switch and 180,575 units on PlayStation 5 for an opening week total of 821,770 retail copies sold.

On the hardware side, the Switch family sold 62,158 units, the PlayStation 5 family sold 23,672 units, the Xbox Series family sold 3,070 units, and the PlayStation 4 family sold 35 units.

Get the full sales charts below.

Software Sales (followed by lifetime sales)

  1. [NSW] Dragon Quest III HD-2D Remake (Square Enix, 11/14/24) – 641,195 (New)
  2. [PS5] Dragon Quest III HD-2D Remake (Square Enix, 11/14/24) – 180,575 (New)
  3. [NSW] Super Mario Party Jamboree (Nintendo, 10/17/24) – 32,762 (442,593)
  4. [NSW] Mario & Luigi: Brothership (Nintendo, 11/07/24) – 15,168 (78,609)
  5. [NSW] Beyblade X: XONE (FuRyu, 11/14/24) – 9,507 (New)
  6. [NSW] Animal Crossing: New Horizons (Nintendo, 03/20/20) – 5,784 (7,954,332)
  7. [NSW] Mario Kart 8 Deluxe (Nintendo, 04/28/17) – 5,647 (6,055,931)
  8. [NSW] Minecraft (Microsoft, 06/21/18) – 4,771 (3,676,339)
  9. [NSW] Romancing SaGa 2: Revenge of the Seven (Square Enix, 10/24/24) – 4,551 (96,293)
  10. [NSW] Luigi’s Mansion 3 (Nintendo, 10/31/19) – 4,445 (1,051,401)

Rankings 11 to 30 will be announced on November 22.

  1. [PS5] LEGO Horizon Adventures (SIE, 11/14/24) – (New)
  2. [NSW] LEGO Horizon Adventures (Spike Chunsoft, 11/14/24) – (New)
  3. [NSW] Debut Project: Cooking Cafe (D3 Publisher, 11/14/24) – (New)
  4. [NSW] Suika Game Special Edition (Aladdin X, 11/14/24) – (New)
  5. [NSW] UFO Robot Grendizer: The Feast of the Wolves (3goo, 11/14/24) – (New)
  6. [NSW] Battle Spirits CrossOver (FuRyu, 11/07/24) –
  7. [NSW] The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom (Nintendo, 09/26/24) –
  8. [PS5] Slitterhead (Bokeh Game Studio, 11/08/24) –
  9. [NSW] Nintendo Switch Sports (Nintendo, 04/29/22) –
  10. [PS5] Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 (Activision, 10/25/24) –
  11. [NSW] Super Smash Bros. Ultimate (Nintendo, 12/07/18) –
  12. [PS5] Professional Baseball Spirits 2024-2025 (Konami, 10/17/24) –
  13. [PS5] Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster (Capcom, 11/08/24) –
  14. [NSW] Powerful Pro Baseball 2024-2025 (Konami, 07/18/24) –
  15. [NSW] Pokemon Scarlet / Pokemon Violet (The Pokemon Company, 11/18/22) –
  16. [NSW] River City Saga: Three Kingdoms Next (Arc System Works, 11/07/24) –
  17. [PS4] Romancing SaGa 2: Revenge of the Seven (Square Enix, 10/24/24) –
  18. [PS5] Dragon Ball: Sparking! ZERO (Bandai Namco, 10/11/24) –
  19. [NSW] Super Mario Bros. Wonder (Nintendo, 10/20/23) –
  20. [NSW] Super Mario Odyssey (Nintendo, 10/27/17) –
  21. [NSW] Momotaro Dentetsu World: Chikyuu wa Kibou de Mawatteru! (Konami, 11/16/23) –
  22. [NSW] Splatoon 3 (Nintendo, 09/09/22) –
  23. [NSW] Pikmin 4 (Nintendo, 07/21/23) –
  24. [PS4] Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 (Activision, 10/25/24) –
  25. [PS5] Metaphor: ReFantazio (ATLUS, 10/11/24) –
  26. [NSW] Clubhouse Games: 51 Worldwide Classics (Nintendo, 06/05/20) –
  27. [NSW] Momotaro Dentetsu: Showa, Heisei, Reiwa mo Teiban! (Konami, 11/19/20) –

Hardware Sales (followed by lifetime sales)

  1. Switch OLED Model – 38,491 (8,212,932)
  2. Switch Lite – 18,416 (6,217,801)
  3. PlayStation 5 Pro – 13,878 (91,964)
  4. PlayStation 5 – 8,462 (5,271,021)
  5. Switch – 5,251 (19,943,681)
  6. PlayStation 5 Digital Edition – 1,332 (868,569)
  7. Xbox Series S – 1,019 (324,097)
  8. Xbox Series X Digital Edition – 1,308 (7,949)
  9. Xbox Series X – 743 (309,193)
  10. PlayStation 4 – 35 (7,928,793)
